ComicInfo.Title: Institutionalized Part One
ComicInfo.Summary: After the fallout (nuclear and otherwise) of Deadpool's antics out in Arizona, the federal government is faced with an impossible question: What to do with Deadpool? Luckily, Deadpool's gamma-powered legal defense team provides an answer: Stick him in an institution! When you think about it, it might be the only solution—after all he really does need some professional help as well as protection from the enemy; himself.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:20:33. [CVDB278812]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jordan D. White, Nick Lowe
ComicInfo.Characters: Deadpool, Ellen Whitby, Foolkiller (Gerhardt), Jack Serious, She-Hulk
